bibl.title: Late Egypt and Her Neighbours. Foreign Population in Egypt in the First Millennium BC. Translated by Dorota DZIERZBICKA. (The Journal of Juristic Papyrology. Supplements. 12.)
bibl.note: Introduction. - Part One. Beginnings. Foreigners in Egypt in the second millennium BC. - Part Two. The situation in the first millennium BC: - Egypt and neighbouring territories in the first millennium BC; - Foreign population in Egypt in the first millennium BC (I). Groups coming from the North; - Foreign population in Egypt in the first millennium BC (II). Groups coming from the East; - Foreign population in Egypt in the first millennium BC (III). Groups coming from the West; - Foreign population in Egypt in the first millennium BC (IV). Groups coming from the South; - Final Remarks. - Bibliography. Indices. - Pp. xi-xii: Tomasz DERDA and Jakub URBANIK, From the Editors. [J.K.W. passed away on 27 February 2009.]
